entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Rain beginning overnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
